episode_event_general_glasses_2022/6701_:
Quiet, you! Like I said, we’re just gonna give you
a little makeover—Team Break style.

You’ll look soooo much cooler wearing one of
our masks!

All right, that’s the spirit! Now let’s go slap one of
these masks on everyone on Pasio!
Can’t you see how unhappy he is?

How dare you force your own sense of fashion
on someone else!

And don’t you realize how important glasses are
to us in our daily lives? They’re a part of us—like
our partner Pokémon!

That’s right! We’re not gonna just stand by and let
you take away something so essential!

More importantly, I wouldn’t be caught dead
wearing a horrible-looking mask like that!

You’re gonna accept our fashion sense, and
you’re gonna like it!

Which one of you’s gotta problem with my
sunglasses?
D-don’t back down! We can take ’em all!
